text: Ana chichi chisawisye kukwenu (chakuntendekasya) kuti nkaputa ngondo petala lya Allah, ni (kwakulupusya) wali wangalikombolela mwa achalume, achakongwe ni wanache, wakasatiji: “Ambuje wetu! Tukoposyani m'musiwu (wa Maaka) wauli achinsyene wakwe walupuso, soni tuwichilani kuumila Kukwenu nkutugosa, soni tuwichilani kuumila Kukwenu nkutukamuchisya.”
